New Records: LeBron James earned his first triple-double of the 2024-25 NBA season with 32 points, 14 rebounds, and 10 assists
Key Match Events: The Lakers outscored the Kings 44-33 in the fourth quarter with LeBron James being the engine behind the offensive outburst
All five of L.A.'s starters scored at least 16 points against the Kings
Pre-Game Insights: The preseason expectations for the Lakers were probably about as low as they've ever been since LeBron first signed in 2018
The Lakers were predicted to be 13th in the power rankings
Post-Match Reflections: The early returns on first-year head coach JJ Redick are certainly encouraging
The Lakers could be a serious threat in the Western Conference
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Lakers are off to a 3-0 start and sit fifth in offensive rating (120.1), per NBA.com
All five of L.A.'s starters scored at least 16 points against the Kings
The team went 14-of-34 from beyond the arc
Others: Anthony Davis praised LeBron James' sustained greatness and facing a talented bigman in Domantas Sabonis
Kevin O'Connor praised JJ Redick for unlocking Anthony Davis and improving the Lakers' offense
